snippet: A roundup of what worked — and what didn’t — in the 2012-13 television schedules, and what to expect from the coming upfronts.
abstract: Roundup of how television programs fared in 2012-2013 schedules, and what to expect at from coming advertiser upfronts.
lead_paragraph: A roundup of what worked — and what didn’t — in the 2012-13 television schedules, and what to expect from the coming upfronts.

headline.seo: TV Networks Preview the New Season
headline.main: The Outlook for the Next TV Season, as Presented to Advertisers Upfront
headline.print_headline: The Outlook for the Next TV Season, as Presented to Advertisers Upfront
